message: I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  It's a fair start, considering the inflation dynamic favors me.
I'm being generous, but I'm not giving up too much. Your turn to make a better offer!
Let's find some middle ground. I'm willing to concede a bit, but I still need to make a profit in this deal.  Accept this, and we can end this game before the inflation gets worse for both of us.
I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further erosion of my earnings due to inflation. You're still getting a good deal, so I hope you'll reconsider.
